review_data.title: great place

review_data.title: Excelente servicio y muy buena comida

review_data.title: Perfect for a drink, cozy!
review_data.content: I haven't eaten here, but go here for years for having a few drinks with friends and for that it's perfect! The atmosphere is great, people friendly, cozy carpets and sofas. On Weekends there is also dj's playing good sound. Perfect choice for a good...More

review_data.title: After work drinks and light meals

review_data.title: Die perfekte After-Work Location
review_data.content: ein Klassiker in Zürich: Freitags nach der Arbeit ins Talacker! Immer gerne gemacht und immer gerne wieder.

review_data.title: One of my favorite places in Zurich
review_data.content: A great place for lunch. Has a very interesting, cozy interior. The staff is very attentive. My favorite dish is a ramen soup (which is nothing like a real ramen, but very tasty though). It is also a very good place for an after work...More

review_data.title: BEST IN TOWN

review_data.title: Excellent Curry for Lunch
review_data.content: Talacker has a very tasty Curry for Lunch - actually the best in Zurich. We go there frequently, and it is always a pleasure.

review_data.title: Good place to start an evening
review_data.content: Good place for going for a drink in the evenings. The atmosphere is quite lively. Descent variety of drinks, however, not many options for wine drinkers.

review_data.title: Gute Bar für einen Drink am Freitagabend
review_data.content: Am Freitagabend immer voll - gute Stimmung insbesondere im Sommer, wenn man auch draussen sein kann.

review_data.title: THE after-work spot for drinks in Zürich
review_data.content: The living room style interior of the bar is directly teleported from the 70's, including old-school disco-lights and a huge 'Kitsch' mural of some Dachshunds (Dackel). On the busier evenings they have a DJ who sets up his gear on one of the living room...More

review_data.title: A great place for both lunch and after work drinks
